system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
Effect: The user gains increases the default stage of their highest Stat by +1 and heals 3 Ticks of Hit Points. The user then freely uses a Status-Category attack matching the <Type> of the Z-Crystal on their Active List.
Requirement: A Status-Category attack on the user's Active List and <Type> Z-Crystal matching the Type of that attack as an Accessory Item.
